alert.note: Alert for Bennett (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 16 at 12:20PM MST until December 16 at 2:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Blizzard Winding Down Today... .The blizzard is slowly winding down and winds are gradually diminishing. However, blizzard conditions will persist for a while yet this afternoon across much of the western South Dakota plains. ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Bennett County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
